Rule.Name: Public methods should contain try catch block
Rule.Description: All public methods should contain a try catch block and should wrap all exceptions as ExtractException objects.
Rule.Resolution: Add a try catch block that will wrap the caught exception as an ExtractException.

Rule.Name: Methods should contain valid ELI codes.
Rule.Description: All ELI codes should contain the string "ELI" followed by 5 digits.
Rule.Resolution: Replace the invalid ELI code with a valid one.
